text.section: This section does not require the Montgomery Commission or the employee organization to agree to any proposal or to make any concession.

section.section:
The Montgomery Commission and an employee organization certified as exclusive representative:
shall begin collective bargaining on or before September 1 in the fiscal year before the beginning of a fiscal year for which an agreement has not been reached; and
shall complete collective bargaining on or before the following February 1.
During the period set forth in paragraph (1) of this subsection, the parties shall negotiate in good faith.
